rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance lobby with minimalistic design and ample natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-concept living area integrated with dining space, featuring expansive glass walls for seamless indoor-outdoor flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern minimalist kitchen designed with efficient storage and appliances, incorporating a window to enhance ventilation and light.

openings.description: Glass door entry to maintain visual connectivity with the exterior

rooms.name: Master Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious studio bedroom combining living and sleeping areas in a minimalist style with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom adjacent to the master studio bedroom, designed with minimal fixtures.

openings.feature: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample daylight and Vastu-compliant directional alignment

openings.description: A minimalist staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with safety in mind
